Task.Description: Check which course the orders have chosen for the first course, tell the sous chef what he should prepare and then cook the courses
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to add salt to the first course

Task.Description: Check which course the orders have chosen for the second course, tell the sous chef what he should prepare and then cook the courses
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to add salt to the second course

Task.Description: Check which types of desserts the orders have chosen, tell the sous chef what he needs to prepares and cook the desserts
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to melt chocolate before serving

Task.Description: Check which types of salads the orders have chosen, tell the sous chef what he needs to prepares and cook the salads
Task.Remarks: Chop the onion finely

Task.Description: Prepare for cooking all the vegetables that the chef asked for
Task.Remarks: cut them chopped

Task.Description: Prepare the pans, pots and ovens for cooking
Task.Remarks: Be careful not to burn the oil

Task.Description: Prepare the meat that the chef asked for cooking
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to sharpen the knife

Task.Description: Check which of the ingredients the chef asked to prepare are in stock and make a list of all the ingredients that are missing
Task.Remarks: Only what is really necessary

Task.Description: Serve the food
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to smile at the customer and bring a tooth pices

Task.Description: Clear the food from the tables between the courses
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to wipe the tables

Task.Description: Serve the wine bottles to the tables, open them and pour into glasses
Task.Remarks: Do not leave the cork on the diner's table

Task.Description: wash the dirty dishes
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to use hot water for greasy dishes

Task.Description: Wash the floor after finishing preparing the food
Task.Remarks: Don't forget before to pick things up from the floor

Task.Description: wipe the wet dishes
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to wipe inside the glass

Task.Description: Put the dishes in place after the wiping
Task.Remarks: Put every tool in its place and do not change the order

Task.Description: Transport the food from the catering kitchen to the event location
Task.Deliverables: The food at the event location
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to turn on the cooling in the truck

Task.Description: Return the dishes that belong to the catering kitchen after the end of the event
Task.Deliverables: The dishes at the catering kitchen
Task.Remarks: Be careful not to break dishes when you bring them back

Task.Description: Load the food to the truck
Task.Remarks: Be careful not to spill the food in the car

Task.Description: Coordinates the details of the transaction with the customer
Task.Deliverables: The transaction details are coordinated with the customer
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to ask what event it is

Task.Description: Collects the payment from the orders
Task.Deliverables: The transaction payment has been made
Task.Remarks: Ask whether to split into payments

Task.Alias: Take care of a shopping list
Task.Description: Ordering the groceries from the grocery list
Task.Remarks: Check that there are no duplicates

Task.Alias: Take care of the salaries of the employees
Task.Description: Transfers the salaries to the employees on the 10th of the month
Task.Deliverables: All the employees got their salaryies
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to add bonuses

Task.Description: Talks with the suppliers and makes sure that there is no shortage of equipment in the kitchen
Task.Deliverables: The catering kitchen is equipped with all the necessary dishes
Task.Remarks: Don't forget to talk to the chef to know what equipment is missing
